entity.name: Updates on COVID-19 in Australia
entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with information and advice from the prime minister, state and federal governments, health authorities and other trusted sources from around Australia. For more, visit https://www.health.gov.au/.

text: @JRehling He needs to be impeached for the way he is handling this pandemic. I have never seen anything like this. A U.S. President recklessly costing Americans their lives. He is unfit for office and needs to be removed. The United States cannot handle one more crisis with him in office.
